info.name: JEP 380 - Unix-Domain Socket Channels
info.desc: Add support for Unix-domain sockets, commonly used for inter-process communication on the same host.

info.name: JEP 386 - Alpine Linux Port
info.dscr: Ports the JDK to Alpine Linux and other Linux distributions using musl as their primary C library on x64 and AArch64.

name: JEP 390 - Warnings for Value-Based Classes
desc: Designate wrapper classes as value-based and add warnings about attempts to synchronize on them.

info.name: JEP 394 - Pattern Matching for instanceof
info.dscr: Enhances instanceof operator to perform pattern matching, reducing boilerplate code.

name: Strongly Encapsulate JDK Internals by Default
desc: Strongly encapsulate all internal elements of the JDK by default, allowing access only via the `--illegal-access` option.

info.name: JEP 395 - Records
info.dscr: Finalizes Records, transparent carriers for immutable data; see RecordDemo.java
